import{useRef,useEffect}from"react";export default function useInterval(callback,delay){// useInterval Custom Hook 선언
var savedCallback=useRef();useEffect(function(){savedCallback.current=callback;},[callback]);useEffect(function(){function tick(){savedCallback.current();}if(delay!==null){var id=setInterval(tick,delay);return function(){return clearInterval(id);};}},[delay]);}
